3 namespace Ubiquity\controllers\admin\popo;

5 class TranslateMessage {
6  private $mkey;
7  private $mvalue;
8  private $compare;
9  private $newKey;
10 
11  public function __construct($key = '', $value = '', $compare = null) {
12  $this->mkey = $key;
13  if (is_array ( $value )) {
14  $this->mvalue = $value [0];
15  $this->newKey = $value [1];
16  } else {
17  $this->mvalue = $value;
18  $this->newKey = null;
19  }
20  $this->compare = $compare;
21  }
22 
27  public function getMkey() {
28  return $this->mkey;
29  }

68  $this->compare = $compare;

75  public static function load($messages, $addNew = true) {
76  $result = [ ];
77  foreach ( $messages as $key => $value ) {
78  $result [$key] = new TranslateMessage ( $key, $value );
79  }
80  if ($addNew) {
81  $result [''] = new TranslateMessage ( '', '' );
82  }
83  return $result;
84  }
85 
93  public static function loadAndCompare($messages, $compareTo, $addNew = true, $addInexisting = true) {
94  $result = [ ];
95  foreach ( $messages as $key => $value ) {
96  $result [$key] = new TranslateMessage ( $key, $value );
97  if (isset ( $compareTo [$key] )) {
98  $result [$key]->setCompare ( $compareTo [$key] );
99  unset ( $compareTo [$key] );
100  }
101  }
102  if ($addInexisting) {
103  foreach ( $compareTo as $key => $value ) {
104  $result [$key] = new TranslateMessage ( $key, '', $value );
105  }
106  }
107  if ($addNew) {
108  $result [''] = new TranslateMessage ( '', '' );
109  }
110  return $result;
111  }
112 
117  public function getNewKey() {
118  return $this->newKey;
119  }
120 }
